thread.title: James
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by James

author: James
title: James
text: James greeted us, asked what we were interested in, and we ask if we could look around, he ever followed us like a fulture (like at other stores), when it came time for us to ask questions we went to him and he answered them very professionally... we placed our order an was notified when it came in, the gentleman at the dock was professional as we... overall great experience!!!
